org.libex.concurrent

Class TimedCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libex.concurrent.TimedCounter

  • @ThreadSafe
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class TimedCounter
extends Object
    Maintains the count of event during the most recent time period.
    Author:
    John Butler
